name: webpack2.2-hands-on
description: This is a part of my webpack learning journey, we wrote this documents to help myself re-formulate what I have learnt, clarify my thinking. This hands-on is step-by-steps configure webpack as well as detail of what problems we are trying to solve. My advise is stick with this hands-on, doing by yourself, look at [the webpack official docs][twod]  for clarification.
